price: (Abͻfoͻ no) kaa sε: ”Nokorε bͻhyε na yεde hyε woͻ no, enti hwε na wankͻka wͻn a wᴐn abamu abuo no ho“.
arabic: قَالُواْ بَشَّرۡنَٰكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ فَلَا تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلۡقَٰنِطِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qālū basharnāka bil-ḥaqi falā takun mina al-qāniṭīna
